title: Sodium chloride-assisted CVD enables controlled synthesis of large single-layered MoS2
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30982-30989
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02510E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ting Li, Chong Zhang, Yali Cai, Wenfeng Yue, Jie Liu, Chuanwei Huang, Quansheng Guo, Tingting Jia, Shuhui Yu
In this work, a simple and low-cost CVD method for growing large-size thin-layers MoS2 (∼200 μm) is proposed.
